reviewText: As the series edged towards upset and drama in season 6, the series starts to become tense and difficult to watch. While the sixth season had a few powerful moments, the seventh season is unnecessary. The DVD offers fine audio/video quality, although little in the way of extras. Not recommended aside from fans who are looking to complete their collection of the series. Speaking of that, given Gene's history of marketing products, I'd be surprised if there was not a whole series set in a giant Kiss-themed box and somehow the discs - which are top-loaded - roll down a giant tongue.
summary: "Family Jewels" worked well as a sitcom-ish look at the "reality" of Gene Simmons.
Title: Gene Simmons Family Jewels: The Final Season

reviewText: It got kind of annoying that shannon wouldn't stop talking about adoption for like half the season. But after that it got better, it's nice to complete the Gene Simons: Family Jewels dvd collection.
Title: Gene Simmons Family Jewels: The Final Season

reviewText: This is the worst season of the show. It has totally went down hill. I don't like this, and will not be worth buying.
Title: Gene Simmons Family Jewels: The Final Season

reviewText: I haven't seen another reality show that keeps me as entertained as this one does. It's really funny and a must see from start to finish.
Title: Gene Simmons Family Jewels: The Final Season

reviewText: Perhaps overstaying it's welcome a little, the series is a must for Kiss fans, but maybe not for others.  Has some entertaining moments, but clearly the sow has run it's course and the novelty factor of watching Simmons in his natural (scripted) habitat has worn a little thin.
Title: Gene Simmons Family Jewels: The Final Season
